Text:
SWF is an open format and if someone wants to peek at your scripting and extract your resources, they can easily do so. Flashincrypt is a program that can prevent this.

Flashincrypt is a flash protection tool. It can add protection to the .swf file. It does not add the normal protection like Flash 5 or Flash MX. We use DMM(dynamic memory modify) technology and Actionscript obfuscation technology in this product. So it can effective for the most popular tools on the market to decompile Flash.
